item.title: Twitter Bot
item.description: Over the past week, I have set out with the goal to make a Twitter “bot” that can create orginal (hopefully comedic) joke tweets. The first step in this process was to generate a corpus of tweets to train my model off of. I chose six of the comedy twitter accounts I personally follow, as well as my own and my friend’s twitter, and downloaded around 10,000 tweets from each (my friend and I only have ~200 tweets each so I just downloaded all of ours) into their own individual csv files.

item.title: First Post
item.description: Welcome to my blog! I created this website using the Hugo theme Hermit and I plan to use it to document my projects both extracurricular and in class. I have many projects planned this summer and will be frequently posting about them here!
